div.div: 1. Recover your account by Gmail or phone NO.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-end; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 183px; margin-left: 156px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;

div.div:
4. Redirect with session token
and relay public key

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 226px; margin-left: 166px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;

display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 406px; margin-left: 496px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
10. Decrypt c2 by KMS with context to private key, and
encrypt private key by AES key to cr2

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 366px; margin-left: 306px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 296px; margin-left: 256px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
6. input password and generate random AES key
encrypt them with relay public key cc1, cr1

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 456px; margin-left: 200px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
11 decrypt cr2 to private key
and sign transaction

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 351px; margin-left: 166px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
7. ask for decryption
with c2, cc1 and cr1

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 356px; margin-left: 476px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
